name: Fear of the White
description:
A very simple, beginner, and basic RPG made in a 12 hour game jam. 
Theme: "Winter is Coming"

After a thousand years without snow, a sorcerer finally encounters snow, where in his world, snow drains away his powers. Get to know how that goes with this very short and basic role playing game.

___________________________________
This game is a very short game, that might be expanded or worked on in the future.
